external_references.description: Villadsen, O.. (2019, August 29). More_eggs, Anyone? Threat Actor ITG08 Strikes Again. Retrieved September 16, 2019.
McKeague, B. et al. (2019, April 5). Pick-Six: Intercepting a FIN6 Intrusion, an Actor Recently Tied to Ryuk and LockerGoga Ransomware. Retrieved April 17, 2019.

objects.description: [FIN6](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0037) has obtained and used tools such as [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154), and [AdFind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0552).(Citation: Security Intelligence More Eggs Aug 2019)(Citation: FireEye FIN6 Apr 2019)
